nodes.text: The Crimson Prowler Lightsaber crystal was a Lightsaber crystal sold by 6U-N5 in the Republic outpost on Felucia. It came with the Crimson Prowler Lightsaber. The blade was characterized by a unique, sparkling aura.

The Crimson Prowler Lightsaber Crystal first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)". It has the same effect as the Bravis Sith Lightsaber Crystal, the only difference being the name.
